Class GameSaver

java.lang.Object
util.GameSaver
public class GameSaver extends Object
Provides utility methods for saving, loading, and managing Jest game saves. This class handles serialization and deserialization of game states to disk, allowing players to save their progress and resume games later.

Key features:

  • Save game states to files with custom or auto-generated names
  • Load previously saved game states
  • List all available save files
  • Delete unwanted save files

All save files are stored in the "jest_saves/" directory with a ".jest" extension.

See Also:
  • GameState
  • Game

  • Method Details

    • saveGame

      public static boolean saveGame(Game game, boolean includeExpansion, String saveName)
      Saves the current game state to a file. If no save name is provided, an auto-generated timestamp name is used. Creates the save directory if it doesn't exist.

      Save file naming:

      • Custom name: uses the provided saveName parameter
      • Auto-generated: "save_yyyy-MM-dd_HH-mm-ss" format
      Parameters:
      game - the Game instance to save
      includeExpansion - flag indicating whether the expansion pack is included
      saveName - the desired name for the save file (without extension), or null/empty for auto-generated name
      Returns:
      true if the save was successful, false if an error occurred

    • loadGame

      public static GameState loadGame(String saveName)
      Loads a saved game state from a file. Deserializes the game state from the specified save file.
      Parameters:
      saveName - the name of the save file to load (without extension)
      Returns:
      the loaded GameState object, or null if loading failed

    • listSaves

      public static String[] listSaves()
      Lists all available save files in the save directory. Returns an array of save names without the file extension.
      Returns:
      an array of save file names (without extension), or an empty array if no saves exist or an error occurs

    • deleteSave

      public static boolean deleteSave(String saveName)
      Deletes a saved game file. Removes the specified save file from the save directory.
      Parameters:
      saveName - the name of the save file to delete (without extension)
      Returns:
      true if the file was successfully deleted, false otherwise
